questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A relief sculpture

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) Trees and plants
B) People walking
C) An animal relief sculpture
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A group of people
C) An animal relief sculpture
D) A fountain

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A brick wall
C) A forest
D) A busy street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) Grass
C) A stone wall
D) A river

What animals are depicted in the relief sculpture?
A) Birds and fish
B) Deer and birds
C) Lions and tigers
D) Elephants and rhinos

What material is the relief sculpture made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Stone
D) Glass

What is the texture of the background wall?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and textured
C) Covered in vegetation
D) Painted with murals

How many deer are depicted in the relief sculpture?  
A) Two  
B) Four  
C) Six  
D) Nine

How many birds are depicted in the relief sculpture?  
A) One  
B) Two  
C) Three  
D) Five

A) Painting
B) Mosaic
C) Fresco
D) Bas-relief

A) Perched on a tree
B) Flying above the deer
C) Swimming in water
D) Sitting on the ground

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Green

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Yellow

A) Left
B) Right
C) Forward
D) Backward

A) Leaves
B) Buildings and houses
C) People and vehicles
D) Stars and planets

A) New and shiny
B) Old and weathered
C) Broken and damaged
D) Painted and colorful

A) Clean and new
B) Old and weathered
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Painted with murals

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the wall?
A) The sculpture is painted on the wall
B) The sculpture is carved into the wall
C) The sculpture is attached to the wall
D) The sculpture is projected onto the wall

A) To decorate a public space

A) Modern

A) Human activities
B) Wildlife and nature

B) Vertical

D) Circular

D) Modern

B) Rough

D) Glossy

A) They are fighting
B) They are grazing
